view

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.Text

  • public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
    Text rendering facility. Stores the string that will be rendered internally. Needs to be queued for rendering every frame. Can control transparency, color, size position on the screen.
    Author:
    Tadas

        public Text(java.lang.String storedText,
    int size)

        storedText - string that will be drawn onto the screen
        size - Text size
